name: Clicker VirusWorld 2060
description:
⭐ IMPROVEMENTS of the CONTAGION and MORTALITY features of your VIRUS clicker 🦠 WORLD 2060: Inside this clicker (in the bottom menu) you have the improvements of your clicker (virus) which is represented with: 1️⃣ 1️ GIFT 🎁 where you will have the possibility to look at an ad that has REWARDS to multiply everything you have X2, X4 or X6, you also have a REWARD that stops births for 2 minutes, all rewards can be repeated once the indicated time has passed.
2️⃣ A hand that with each purchase INCREASES your CLICK for example if you buy 3 hands each click of yours is 3 more virus infections and so on.
3️⃣ And a chemistry instrument that represents the SCIENTISTS located on the right side of the planet: with each purchase of scientist you ENSURE that for every 1 second you have 1 more death, example: if you buy 100 scientists for every 1 second you will have 100 automatic deaths.

⭐ VIRUS Difficulty 🦠 WORLD (clicker 2060):
-Every 50 seconds of gameplay new inhabitants are born that delay your final goal, these births vary between 100 and 50000 randomly.

⭐A world of wars, devastated waiting to be saved, but your deadly clicker arrives to destroy it, enjoy virus world: for free anti Heroes Clicker.

⭐Minimalistic graphics and mesmerizing sound, Enjoy our CLICKER GAME!!!!
